A

add(String) - Method in class server.BloomFilter
The add function, given a string, inserts it into the bloom filter, that is: Runs all the hash functions on the string and turn on the relevant bits in the bit array.
add(String) - Method in class server.CacheManager
The add function, given a word, will update the crp and add the word to the cache.
add(String) - Method in interface server.CacheReplacementPolicy
 
add(String) - Method in class server.LFU
The add function adds a word to the structure while maintaining its policy.
add(String) - Method in class server.LRU
The add function adds a word to the list of words while maintaining its policy.
addedWord - Variable in class model.GuestHandler
 
addedWordStr - Variable in class model.GuestHandler
 
addObserver(Observer) - Method in interface model.GameModel
 
addObserver(Observer) - Method in class model.GuestModel
The addObserver function adds an observer to the list of observers.
addObserver(Observer) - Method in class model.HostModel
The addObserver function adds an observer to the list of observers.
addScore(int) - Method in class model.GuestModel
The addScore function adds the given number to the score of the guest player.
addScore(int) - Method in class model.Player
The addScore function adds the score parameter to the current score.
addTiles(String) - Method in class model.GuestModel
The addTiles function is called when the server sends a message that contains tiles for the guest player.
